channel.title: Deli on Grocery Stories
channel.description: Recent content in Deli on Grocery Stories

item.title: I Camisa
item.description: When Cristina Onuta first entered I Camisa & Son in 1999, the shop still had sawdust on the floors — to prevent people from slipping after rain — and cured sausages dangling from the ceiling. While regulations have put an end to these trademarks, little else about the shop has changed since it opened in Soho in 1961. At age 20, Cristina Onuta left Romania to take a six-month English course in London.
